question: Nasiruddin Mahmud was succeeded by which of the following kings?
explanation: Nasiruddin Mahmud was succeeded by Ghiyas ud din Balban who was the ninth sultan of the Mamluk dynasty. He ruled the Delhi sultanate from 1266 CE to 1286 CE. He was the most powerful ruler of the sultanate betweenÂ  Shamsuddin Iltutmish and Alauddin khilji.
